name: Component Tokens & Themes Example [learn Figma Tokens]
description:
Learn how to build a theme-able or multi-brand design system using Figma Tokens with component specific tokens and multiple semantic layers.


Included in this file:

  • One component with component based design tokens
  • 2 semantic/theme layers (light/dark mode)
  • A core token layer with option tokens
  • A working example of a card


To use this example you need to install the Figma Tokens plugin:

https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/843461159747178978/Figma-Tokens


Feel free to post questions and suggestions for other Figma Tokens related learning materials in the comments.
